exercise.title: 05.01 Sum of Two Numbers

p.i: Can you use JavaScript to add two numbers together and write the sum into the browser console?

exercise.p: Define the following three variables: x, y, z. Assign 3 to x. Assign 4 to y. After that, assign the sum of x and y to z. Finally, write the value of z into the browser console.
Submit a link to your code (myy or jsbin).
